post.body: those are the best kind.
awesome.

... i could spend all day reading those how to's.
for the rest of yous - social networking goldmine: http://tinyurl.com/8yemwj
nic! that's totally my favorite quote (and my favorite christmas movie!)
it's not rocket science, but it does take some common sense. THAT is hard to come by. sigh...i wish i could wrap this year!
just ate a julias empanada (money!)... somehow, i'm getting a ride to gburg for party #2. (btw, still in santa suit. sans pants.)
getting a little more than tipsy! eeps i have to drive to gburg tonight (sorry mo)
being a santa for charity.
santa suit acquired. time for charity "work"
listening to unintentional mash-up of sheryl crow + a rap song (at airport next to teen w/ loud ipod). bad, very bad.
is trimming her christmas tree (and the rest of the condo).
is freezing.
omg. that was nuts.
cc sports pub is evil. but so so good.
trying to cross more things off my list. this list sucks.
will pay someone to make her phone stop ringing and her outlook to stop. 80's music to the rescue.
newscaster at channel 7 on the DC tax free week coming up: "this means you won't pay the $5.75% tax." ... five DOLLAR and 75 percent tax?
the contractors i scheduled for NEXT friday are here. now. kinda works in my favor, but still kinda annoying. then again, i get a new sink!
loved that macys just did a live rick roll. puppets + rick astley = hilarious.
listening to a playlist of: the cure, oasis, heart (!), bryan adams, death cab, prince and nirvana. yes, random. surprisingly, it works.
is having an unusual off day in the kitchen today. overripe banana donors at work will be disappointed when there's no breakfast tomorrow.
any place that plays lionel richie = awesome in my book
relaxing. (that means yeungling)
just got back from having ethiopian with an old friend that i havent seen since 1994. sick. and fun.
so. annoyed. at the postal service. and usps.com.
2nd use for my santa stumble costume: door decorating contest... yes, yes, very cheesy. the face: obama (totally cracking myself up!)
unpacking: left my glasses in denver. excuse to buy new. man ive given myself lots of unintentional, non-budgeted, gifts this xmas. :(
watching: documentary on moonshine and marijuana in appalachia. hosted by billy ray cyrus. it's THAT cold.
it is currently -1 degrees in denver. i didn't last outside very long, but glad i brought the down coat.
accidently left my phone on during flight. no worries, we landed safe.
omg. she just asked him for a nail file.
it is way too early to sit next to a paris hilton socialite wannabe snob complain to her unassuming nerd boyfriend.
is anyone else watching rockin' eve? dick aint looking so good. nye=dick clark. happy new year!
party! happy new year!
finally have a working phone... two actually! NYD plans: transferring settings and downloading gadgets to the new. le sigh.
new non-broken phone comes tomorrow. YAY! civilization!
doesn't want to go to work tomorrow!
wants coffee and a magic elf to clean up her mess of a condo. right now.
spent way too much money today on things i don't need nor want any longer. my name is leah, and i'm a bulimic shopper.
having a broken phone SUCKS. having a broken phone that needs through go through the company to get fixed, sucks even more. HMPH.
christmas should'nt feel this overwhelming. it's not just me right?
waiting for pho. so slow.
watching an awkward first date. awkward!
i hate it when stupid people ruin a perfectly good friday.
